SEARCH
Package farm.inventory

Class BasicInventory

Object
BasicInventory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Inventory
public class BasicInventory extends Object implements Inventory
A very basic inventory that both stores and handles products individually.

Only supports operation on single Products at a time.

Component of Stage 2.

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct(Barcode barcode, Quality quality, int quantity) throws InvalidStockRequestException
      Throws an InvalidStockRequestException with the message: 

      "Current inventory is not fancy enough. Please supply products one at a time."

      Specified by:
      addProduct in interface Inventory
      Parameters:
      barcode - the product type to add to the inventory.
      quality - the quality of the product to add to the inventory.
      quantity - the number of products to add to the inventory.
      Throws:
      InvalidStockRequestException - always, since Basic inventories never support quantities > 1.

    • existsProduct

      public boolean existsProduct(Barcode barcode)
      Description copied from interface: Inventory
      Determines if a product exists in the inventory with the given barcode.
      Specified by:
      existsProduct in interface Inventory
      Parameters:
      barcode - The barcode of the product to check.
      Returns:
      true iff a product exists, else false.

    • removeProduct

      public List<Product> removeProduct(Barcode barcode)
      Description copied from interface: Inventory
      Removes the first product with corresponding barcode from the inventory.
      Specified by:
      removeProduct in interface Inventory
      Parameters:
      barcode - The barcode of the product to be removed.
      Returns:
      A list containing the removed product if it exists, else an empty list.

    • removeProduct

      public List<Product> removeProduct(Barcode barcode, int quantity) throws FailedTransactionException
      Throws an FailedTransactionException with the message: 

      "Current inventory is not fancy enough. Please purchase products one at a time."

      Specified by:
      removeProduct in interface Inventory
      Parameters:
      barcode - the product type to add to the inventory.
      quantity - The total amount of the product to remove from the inventory.
      Returns:
      A list containing the removed product if it exists, else an empty list.
      Throws:
      FailedTransactionException - always, since Basic inventories never support quantities > 1.

    • getAllProducts

      public List<Product> getAllProducts()
      Description copied from interface: Inventory
      Retrieves the full stock currently held in the inventory.
      Specified by:
      getAllProducts in interface Inventory
      Returns:
      A list containing all products currently stored in the inventory.
